Title: Relates to permitting localities to issue building permits based on certain professional certifications
Summary: Authorizes localities to establish a program to allow the issuance of building permits based on certain professional certifications.
LawCode: Amd ยง125, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to a program allowing the issuance of building permits based on certain professional certifications
